-- | A lightweight web framework
--   
--   A lightweight web framework, with type safe routes, based on
--   invertible-syntax, and i18n support.
--   
--   The features of this web framework:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>Type safe routes, specify url-handler mapping in one place.</li>
--   <li>Simple yet elegant handler via type class.</li>
--   <li>Flexible template system, utilize exsisting libraries such as
--   Blaze-Html and Hastache.</li>
--   <li>Easy i18n</li>
--   </ul>
--   
--   For an example, please refer to
--   <a>https://github.com/lilac/ivy-demo/</a>
--   
--   Note: Unlike 0.1 version, this version support snap-server as backend.
